body:
@peterjc123 Do you know how we can fix this error:
```
23:27:46 [421/497] Linking CXX shared library bin\caffe2.dll
23:27:46 FAILED: bin/caffe2.dll LIB/caffe2.lib 
23:27:46 cmd.exe /C "cd . && "C:\Program Files\CMake\bin\cmake.exe" -E vs_link_dll --intdir=caffe2\CMakeFiles\caffe2.dir --manifests  -- C:\PROGRA~2\MIB055~1\2017\COMMUN~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1411~1.255\bin\Hostx86\x64\link.exe /nologo @CMakeFiles/caffe2.rsp  /out:bin\caffe2.dll /implib:LIB\caffe2.lib /pdb:bin\caffe2.pdb /dll /version:0.0 /INCREMENTAL:NO /NODEFAULTLIB:vcomp   && cd ."
23:27:46 LINK: command "C:\PROGRA~2\MIB055~1\2017\COMMUN~1\VC\Tools\MSVC\1411~1.255\bin\Hostx86\x64\link.exe /nologo @CMakeFiles/caffe2.rsp /out:bin\caffe2.dll /implib:LIB\caffe2.lib /pdb:bin\caffe2.pdb /dll /version:0.0 /INCREMENTAL:NO /NODEFAULTLIB:vcomp /MANIFEST /MANIFESTFILE:bin\caffe2.dll.manifest" failed (exit code 1120) with the following output:
23:27:46    Creating library LIB\caffe2.lib and object LIB\caffe2.exp
23:27:46 OptionsGuard.cpp.obj : error LNK2019: unresolved external symbol "public: __int64 __cdecl at::Tensor::get_device(void)const " (?get_device@Tensor@at@@QEBA_JXZ) referenced in function "public: __cdecl at::TensorOptions::TensorOptions(struct at::Tensor,bool)" (??0TensorOptions@at@@QEAA@UTensor@1@_N@Z)
23:27:46 TensorOptions.cpp.obj : error LNK2001: unresolved external symbol "public: __int64 __cdecl at::Tensor::get_device(void)const " (?get_device@Tensor@at@@QEBA_JXZ)
23:27:46 bin\caffe2.dll : fatal error LNK1120: 1 unresolved externals
23:27:46 ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```
